movies.title: Letters to God
movies.plot: A young boy fighting cancer writes letters to God, touching lives in his neighborhood and inspiring hope among everyone he comes in contact. An unsuspecting substitute postman, with a troubled life of his own, becomes entangled in the boy's journey and his family by reading the letters. They inspire him to seek a better life for himself and his own son he's lost through his alcohol addiction.

movies.title: Kurtlar Vadisi Vatan
movies.plot: Polat Alemdar Erhan and Cahit are yet again on the front lines only to discover a military coup attempt in Turkey.

events.title: the Peace at Home Council, part of the armed forces, attempt a coup in Turkey

movies.title: Around the World in 80 Days
movies.plot: A bet pits a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist on a worldwide adventure that they can circle the globe in 80 days.
